summary: CHECK BATTERY LIGHT CAME ON, BATTERY LOST CHARGE, REPLACED BATTERY AND IT LOST CHARGE AGAIN BEFORE ABLE TO TEST ALTERNATOR. ALTERNATOR WAS RED HOT. WILL NEED NEW BATTERY AND ALTERNATOR. WAS A RECALL IN 2014 FOR ALTERNATOR AS WELL (APPEARS THAT RECALL WAS ALREADY DONE ON THIS CAR). CAR DIED AT INTERSECTION WAITING TO TURN.
